1134:456: dharma paṭhanti śṛṇvanti likhantī dharmaratī rata te sada bhonti ||
1134:457: dharmadurbhikṣaya dyotitu dharmo dharmagaveṣiṇa pūrita āśā |
1134:458: chanda janitva prayujya ya dharme bhāṣata dharmaprabhāvani labdhā ||
1134:459: ghoṣavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī buddhasutā paricodanatāyām |
1134:460: yātuka śabdapracāru triloke sarva tathāgataghoṣa śṛṇvanti ||
1134:462: sarvajage jinaghoṣarutārthaṃ niścari ghoṣavatī prabha labdhā ||
1134:463: te'mṛtaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvāḥ |
1134:464: sarva pramāda ciraṃ prajahitvā sarvaguṇaiḥ pratipadyati yogam ||
1134:465: duḥkha aneka upadravapūrṇaṃ bhāṣita saṃskṛta nityamakṣemam |
1134:466: śāntinirodhasukhaṃ sada kṣemaṃ bhāṣayatā amṛtaṃdada labdhā ||
1134:467: raśmi viśeṣavatī yada muñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvā |
1134:469: śīlata agra samādhita agro prajñata agra mahāmunirājā |
1134:470: yaḥ stuta varṇita bodhinidānaṃ tena viśeṣavatī prabha labdhā ||
1134:471: ratnaviyūha ya osari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvāḥ |
1134:472: akṣara ratnanidhāna labhitvā pūjayi ratnavarebhi maharṣīn ||
1134:473: ratnavisarga jine jinastūpe saṃgrahi kṛtsnajanaṃ ratanebhiḥ |
1134:474: ratnapradāna karitva jinānāṃ raśmi nivṛta ya ratnaviyūhā ||
1134:475: gandhaprabhāsa ya osari raśmī tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvāḥ |
1134:476: ghrātva amānuṣa gandha manojñān buddhaguṇe niyutāni bhavanti ||
1134:483: raśmi prasādakarī yada muñcī pāṇitalopama saṃsthihi bhūmiḥ |
1134:484: śodhayato ṛṣi āśramastūpān tena prasādakarī prabha labdhā ||
1134:485: muñcati meghavatī yada raśmiṃ saṃsthihi gandha pravarṣati megham |
1134:486: stūpavarāṅgaṇa gandhajalenā siñciya meghavatī prabha labdhā ||
1134:487: bhūṣaṇavyūha pramuñcatu raśmīnnagna acela subhūṣaṇa bhontī |
1134:489: raśmi rasāgravatī yada muñcībhukṣita bhojya rasāgra labhantī ||
1134:490: bhojana pāna vicitra rasāgrān datva rasāgravatī prabha labdhā ||
1134:491: arthanidarśani muñcati raśmīn ratnanidhāna labhanti daridrāḥ |
1134:493: cakṣuviśodhani muñcati raśmīn andha tadā dṛśi rūpa vicitram |
1134:494: dīpapradāna jine jinastūpe cakṣuviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā ||
1134:495: śrotraviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śrotravihīna śruṇī pṛthu śabdān |
1134:496: vādyapradāna jine jinastūpe śrotraviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā ||
1134:497: ghrāṇaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn ghrāyi aghrāyitapūrva sugandhān |
1134:498: gandhapradāna jine jinastūpe ghrāṇaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttāḥ ||
1134:499: jihvaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn snigdhamanojñarutaiḥ stuti buddhān |
1134:500: vāca durukta vivarjita rūkṣā ślakṣaṇa udīrita raśmi nivṛttā ||
1134:501: kāyaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn indriyahīna suīndriya bhonti |
1134:502: kāyapraṇāma jine jinastūpe kurvata kāyaviśodhani labdhavā ||
1134:503: cittaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn unmatu sarva sacitta bhavanti |
1134:504: citta samādhivaśānuga kṛtvā citaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā ||
1134:505: rūpaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn paśyiya cintiya rūpa narendrān |
1134:506: rūpakaśodhani citra samantāt stūpa alaṃkaratā pratilabdhā ||
1134:507: śabdaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śabda aśabdata śūnya vijānī |
1134:509: gandhaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarva dugandha sugandha bhavantī |
1134:511: te rasaśodhani muñcati raśmīn sadviṣa nirviṣa bhonti rasāgrāḥ |
1134:513: sparśaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn kakkhaṭa sparśa mṛdū sukha bhontī |
1134:515: dṣya aneka mṛdū sukhasparśā saṃstari mārgi vrajanti jinānām |
1134:517: dharmaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarvata romata cintiya dharmān |
1134:518: niścarataḥ śruṇi lokahitānāṃ toṣayi sarvadhimukti jinānām ||
1134:520: dharmata nityasthitā gaganasthā sūcata dharmaviśodhani labdhā ||
1134:521: raśmi sukhāpramukhā iti kṛtvā ekatu romamukhāttu ṛṣīṇām |
1134:522: niścari gaṅgarajopama raśmī sarva pṛthagvidha karmaprayogāḥ ||
1134:523: te yatha ekata romamukhāto osari gaṅgarajopama raśmī |
1134:524: evamaśeṣata sarvatu romā deśa samādhi vikurva ṛṣīṇām ||
1134:525: yena guṇena ya raśmi nivṛttā tasmi guṇeṣu sahāyaka pūrve |
1134:526: teṣu tameva pramuñcati raśmiṃ jñānavikurvaṇa eṣa ṛṣīṇām ||
1134:527: teṣa ya puṇyasahāyaka pūrve yairanumodita yācita yebhiḥ |
1134:528: yebhi ca dṛṣṭa śubhopacitaṃ vā te ima raśmi prajānati teṣām ||
1134:529: ye ca subhoṣacittāḥ kṛtapuṇyāḥ pūjita yebhi punaḥ punaḥ buddhāḥ |
1134:530: arthika chandika buddhaguṇebhiḥ codana teṣa karoti ya raśmiḥ ||
1134:531: sūrya yathā jātyandha na paśyī no ca sa nāsti udeti sa loke |
1134:532: cakṣusameta udāgamu jñātvā sarva prayujya svakasvaka dharme ||
1134:533: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī |
1134:534: mithyahatā adhimuktivihīnāḥ durlabha te ca udāramatīnām ||
1134:535: ābharaṇāni nipāna vimānāḥ ratna rasāyana gandhanulepāḥ |
1134:536: te'pi tu asti mahātmajanasya te ca sudurlabha kṛcchragatānām ||
1134:537: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī |
1134:538: mithyahatā adhimuktivihīnāḥ durlabha te ca udāramatīnām ||
1134:539: yasyimu raśmiprabheda śruṇitvā bheṣyati śraddadhimukti prasādaḥ |
1134:540: tena na kāṅkṣa na saṃśaya kāryo nāṅga na bheṣyi mahāguṇaketuḥ ||
1134:544: kāyaparyaṅka parisphuṭa padmaṃ darśayi eṣa samādhi vikurvā ||
1134:546: sarva parīvṛta buddhasutebhī ye ca samādhyasamādhivihārī ||
1134:547: ye paripācita tena ṛṣīyāṃ sattva niṣpādita buddhaguṇeṣu |
1134:548: te parivāriya taṃ mahapadmaṃ sarva udikṣiṣu prāñjalibhūtāḥ ||
1134:549: te ca samāhita bālaśarīre vyutthihi yauvanavegasthitebhyaḥ |
1134:551: jīrṇaka vṛddhaśarīri samāhita vyutthihi śraddha upāsikakāyāt |
1134:553: bhikṣuṇikāya śarīri samāhita vyuthihi bhikṣu bahuśrutakāyāḥ |
1134:561: sarvata bhūtaśarīri samāhita vyutthihi ekatu romasukhātaḥ |
1134:562: ekatu romamukhasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata romamukheṣu |||
1134:563: sarviṣu romamukheṣu samāhita vyutthihi ekatu vālapathātaḥ ||
1134:564: ekatu vālapathasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata vālapathebhyaḥ ||
1134:565: sarviṣu vālapatheṣu samāhita vyutthihi te paramāṇurajātaḥ ||
1134:566: ekarajasmi samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvarajebhya aśeṣam ||
1134:569: vṛkṣaphaleṣu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi raśmimukhebhi jinānām |
1134:573: vāyupathe tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi bhūmitalātu mahātmā |
1134:574: bhūmitale tu samāhita bhūtvā byutthihi sarvatu devavimānāt ||
1134:575: sarvi tu devabalāna samāhita byutthihi te gaganānusmṛtīmān |
1134:577: kalpa acintya prabhāṣiyamāṇāḥ sarvajinebhi na śakya kṣayītum |
1134:578: sarvajinebhi ca bhāṣita ete karmavipāku jagasya acintyo ||
1134:579: nāgavikurvita buddhavikurvā dhyāyina dhyāna acintya vikurvā |
1134:580: te ca vaśe sthita aṣṭa vimokṣāḥ śrāvaka ekabhavī bahu bhontī ||
1134:581: bhūtva bahuḥ puna eka bhavitvā dhyāyati prajvalate gaganasmin ||
1134:582: te hi mahākaruṇāya vihīnā bodhianarthiku loka upekṣī ||
1134:583: darśayi kāyavikurva acintyā kasya na darśayi lokahitaiṣī |
1134:584: candra sasūrya nabhe vicarantau darśayi sarvadiśi pratibhāsam ||
1134:586: evamacintiya darśiyi rūpaṃ sarvadaśaddiśi te naravīrāḥ ||
1134:589: teṣu svarāṅgaruteṣu vidhijñā toṣayi sarvarutān svarutena |
1134:590: sā hi sarāga sadoṣa rutāvati sarvarute pratighoṣavidhijñā ||
1134:591: dhāraṇi dharmabalaṃ vaśiprāptā kaḥ sa na toṣi sadevakalokam |
1134:592: māyakaro yatha vidyavidhijño darśayi rūpa vicitra anantān ||
1134:594: māyakaro hi sarāgu sadoṣo toṣayi māyavikurvita lokam ||
1134:596: rāhu yathe[ṣa] ya nirmiṇi kāyaṃ kurvati vajrapade talabandham ||
1134:598: so'pi sarāgu sadoṣa samoho rāhu nidarśayi īdṛśa ṛddhī ||
1134:599: mārapramardana lokapradīpa kasya na darśayi ṛddhi anantā |
1134:600: paśya acintiya [ śakravi] kurvā devasurendraraṇasmi pravṛtte ||
1134:601: yātuka bimbara nekasurāṇāṃ tātuka nirmiṇi śakru svakāyān |
1134:603: eṣa gṛhyeta vajradharāṇāṃ saṃbhramu gacchisu sarvasurendrāḥ |
1134:604: netra sahastra bhayaṃkara darśī jvālapramuñcana vajra gṛhītam ||
1134:608: sarvajagasya aśeṣata trāṇaṃ akṣaya puṇya kuto na vikurvī |
1134:609: vāyuta saṃbhuta megha pravarṣī vāyuta megha punaḥ prasamentī |
1134:610: vāyuta sasya virohati loke vāyu sukhāvaha sarvajagasya ||
1134:611: so hi aśikṣita pāramitāsu buddhaguṇeṣu aśikṣita vāyu |
1134:612: darśayi lokavipāka acintyā kasya na darśayi te vara labdhā ||
